Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=18 µM);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli ATCC 25726 (MIC=18 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented

Literature.Title: Characterization of antimicrobial peptides from the skin secretions of the Malaysian frogs, Odorrana hosii and Hylarana picturata (AnuraRanidae).
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Kolodziejek J, Nowotny N, Leprince J, Vaudry H, Coquet L, Jouenne T, King JD.

Literature.Title: Characterization of antimicrobial peptides from the skin secretions of the Malaysian frogs, Odorrana hosii and Hylarana picturata (Anura:Ranidae).
Literature.Author: Vaudry H.,Leprince J.,Nowotny N.,Kolodziejek J.,Conlon J.M.
